meanings.definition: Make forceful or violent efforts to get free of restraint or constriction.
meanings.sent1: The cat struggles to escape from the box.
meanings.sent2: She struggles to open the stubborn jar lid.
meanings.sent3: The kite struggles against the strong wind, trying to break free.
meanings.sent4: The fish struggles against the hook, fighting for its freedom.
meanings.sent5: The trapped bird struggles desperately to break out of the cage.

meanings.definition: Engage in conflict or competition with.
meanings.sent1: The two teams struggles for victory on the field.
meanings.sent2: He struggles with his opponent in a fierce wrestling match.
meanings.sent3: The siblings playfully struggles over the last cookie in the jar.
meanings.sent4: The countries struggles for control over the disputed territory.
meanings.sent5: The candidates struggles for the voters' support in the election.

meanings.definition: Have difficulty handling or coping with.
meanings.sent1: She struggles with her math homework every night.
meanings.sent2: He struggles to carry all the heavy grocery bags.
meanings.sent3: The toddler struggles to tie his shoelaces, ending up in a knot.
meanings.sent4: The old car struggles to climb the steep hill.
meanings.sent5: The student struggles with public speaking, feeling nervous and unsure.
